mentionedBy.name: Unity Software Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Primary competitor. Powerful game engine known for exceptional graphics and visual fidelity. Free to use with 5% royalty on revenues exceeding $1M. Strong in AAA games, first-person shooters, and high-end graphics applications. Cross-platform compatibility across PCs, consoles, mobile, and VR.

mentionedBy.name: Unity Software Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Primary competitor with 16.56% market share. One of the most powerful engines available. Ideal for large-scale open-world games, first-person shooters, and high graphical demands. Popular for film and television projects due to real-time rendering and VFX tools. Steeper learning curve than Unity. Free with 5% royalty on revenues exceeding $1M.
